title: Flash Fiction Addiction: 22 Short Short Stories
description: Two passionate flash fiction stories, each involving a dress of a different color; a black one representing sin and a red one, an all consuming lust. At the heart of each story is a woman who has in one way or another become a victim of a man she chose to love. And each one chooses a different way of dealing with these unfortunate circumstance.This is NOT a novel.
author: Summerland
